problem_text_cn: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,点C为⊙O外一点,CA、CD是⊙O的切线,A、D为切点,连接BD、AD．若∠ACD=48°,则∠DBA的大小是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, point C is a point outside of ⊙O, CA and CD are the tangents of ⊙O, A and D are the tangent points. Connect BD and AD. If ∠ACD = N_0, then the size of ∠DBA is ()
raw_comment: 本题考查切线的性质、等腰三角形的性质、直径所对的圆周角是直角等知识,解题的关键是灵活运用所学知识解决问题,属于中考常考题型．
